id: Enfield shooting leaves three men injured
paragraph: Share this withEmailFacebookMessengerMessengerTwitterPinterestWhatsAppLinkedInCopy this linkThese are external links and will open in a new windowThree men are in hospital after a shooting in Enfield, north London.Two of the victims are believed to have suffered gun injuries during the incident in Gordon Road, Edmonton.Police officers and paramedics from London Ambulance Service were called to the scene at about 18:00 GMT, where they found four men.No arrests have been made in connection with the case, the Met Police said.  All three men were taken to a north London hospital for treatment.The BBC is not responsible for the content of external Internet sitesFormer Brexit Secretary Dominic Raab criticises the "lack of will and resolve" in dealing with the EU.What are the differences between the two?
